text: 27|64|athava, srsti arambhikkukayum pinnit at avarttikkukayum, akasattu ninnum bhumiyil ninnum ninnalkk upajivanam nalkukayum ceyyunnavanea? (atalla, avarute daivannalea?) allahuveateappam vere valla daivavumuntea? (nabiye,) parayuka: ninnal satyavanmaranenkil ninnalkkulla teliv ninnal keant varika
